title: Tails 6.0 Anonymous OS Launches February 27th Based on Debian 12 Bookworm
description:
Tails 6.0 anonymous OS is now available for public testing ahead of the official release on February 27th based on the Debian 12 "Bookworm" operating system series.

The post Tails 6.0 Anonymous OS Launches February 27th Based on Debian 12 Bookworm appeared first on 9to5Linux - do not reproduce this article without permission. This RSS feed is intended for readers, not scrapers.
